The user throws three [[shuriken]], infused with [[Lightning Release]] [[chakra]], at the opponent. The addition of lightning-natured chakra increases the lethality and cutting power of the weapons.

== Trivia ==
* In the manga, Boruto was taught this jutsu by Sasuke,<ref>''Saikyou Jump''</ref> while in the anime, he already knew it before meeting him, and refered to it without the Uchiha Style designation.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 28</ref>
